Windlord/Nightlight:

Windlord nodded to Lord Perseus and was ready to foll=
ow it. He was a 
warrior always ready to fight then he was ready for a new =
mission.

***********

Nighlight:

Nightlight moaned weakly.

@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
>
> ::Kup/Lord Eld=
er::
>    
>   Elder: I'll go and present our plan to Lord Perseus. Kup, if=
 you 
don't mind, could you remain here and keep an eye on Hot Rod and 
Rem=
us.

>=
    
>   Elder nodded and looked to Windlord to see if he was ready to go.
=
>    
>   ::Jhiaxus-Hevn::
>

 device and signal masker 
to himself and Nightlight.
>

ehehe. So easy. Beast mode!
>

st mode and picks up 
Nightlight's limp, uncouncious body. He flies off tow=
ards Hydras' 
base. They are invisible to both optics and sensors.
